# micro1

> micro1 is an AI platform focused on human intelligence. We work with top AI labs and enterprises to evaluate subject-matter experts, build teams, and convert their expertise into high-quality AI training data.

## Products
- [Data Engine](https://www.micro1.ai/data-engine): End-to-end human data platform turning human intelligence into high-quality datasets that drive frontier models.
- [Zara](https://www.micro1.ai/zara): AI recruiter agent that sources, vets, and qualifies world-class talent with unprecedented speed and precision.
- [Intelligence](https://www.micro1.ai/intelligence): Accelerate model capability with real-world RL environments and expert-built datasets ready to train on.

## Solution for AI labs
- [End-to-end human data engine](https://www.micro1.ai/data-engine/ai-labs): We recruit experts and manage the complete human data operations to produce high quality data for post-training

## Solutions for enterprises
- [Zara](https://www.micro1.ai/zara/enterprises): AI recruiter agent that sources and vets top talent at scale
- [Agentic AI](https://www.micro1.ai/data-engine/agentic-ai): We design, fine-tune, and evaluate agentic AI that works seamlessly for any use case
- [Robotics Data](https://www.micro1.ai/data-engine/capture-robotics-data): Transform physical workflows into high-quality, proprietary datasets for automation 

## Solution for robotics
- [Human data](https://www.micro1.ai/data-engine/robotics): Data engine to collect, and annotate real world robotics data

## Solution for BPOs
- [Zara](https://www.micro1.ai/zara/staffing): AI recruiter built for high volume recruitment firms and BPOs

## Solution for government
- [America’s AI workforce](https://www.micro1.ai/government): Providing the expertise and agentic AI required to deploy reliable, mission-ready AI systems for the public sector.

## Research
- [Research](https://www.micro1.ai/research): Our research lab aspires to solve humanity’s greatest coordination challenge: deciding where each person should spend their time.

## Careers
- [Careers](https://www.micro1.ai/careers): Work with frontier AI labs in Silicon Valley, 100% remote
- [Jobs](https://www.micro1.ai/jobs): Open roles at micro1
- [Interview Prep](https://www.micro1.ai/interview-prep): Free AI-powered mock interviews and feedback.
- [Referral](https://www.micro1.ai/referral-program): Refer candidates and earn bonuses
- [Candidate reviews](https://www.micro1.ai/candidate-reviews): Reviews from top professionals

## Company
- [Newsroom](https://www.micro1.ai/newsroom): News, press, and media information about micro1.
- [Case studies](https://www.micro1.ai/case-studies): Learn how frontier AI Labs & Fortune 10s work with micro1 to scale their human data operations & recruitment.
- [Forum](https://www.micro1.ai/forum): Conversations shaping the future of AI around model training, recruitment, and human intelligence.
